full_summary:
# **Help Desk Specialists**
## **Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

### **Reference Number:** PW-23-01025027
### **Publication Date:** 2023-02-08
### **Closing Date:** 2023-03-03T14:00:00

The Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (OSFI) invites qualified TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders to submit a proposal for Help Desk Specialists to provide help desk support to the OSFI community and deliver basic network administration services to approximately 1,200 clients.

**Contract Details:**

- **Anticipated Start Date:** 2023-04-10
- **Contract Duration:** From contract award to March 31st, 2024, with irrevocable options to extend for up to four (4) additional one-year periods

**Eligibility Criteria:**

- Qualified TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders with Tier 1 qualification for services in the National Capital Region and Toronto under Stream 4: B.10. Help Desk Specialist for junior and intermediate levels

**Additional Requirements:**

- Compliance with Common PS SRCL #19
- Designated Organization Screening (DOS) minimum corporate security level
- Reliability status or secret minimum resource security level

**Proposal Submission:**

- Proposals will be accepted from the invited qualified supply arrangement holders
- Documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified supply arrangement holders
- Bidders are advised that Buyandsell.gc.ca is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents

**Contact Information:**

- **Contact Name:** Craig Kenny
- **Contact Email:** Contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca

**Security and Eligibility Inquiries:**

- Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement must be submitted to the Contracting Authority named above

Note: The TBIPS Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year. Suppliers can obtain more information on how to become a qualified supply arrangement holder from rcnmdai.ncrimos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. Refer to tender notice for any changes or updates. [1]
